title: Unique Fans Tokenomics Governance Proposal
body:
The Unique Fans project at unique.fans was created to be owned by the community and hence the adoption of our Tokenomics and DAO governance model should be decided by the community.

The Founding Team is proposing the Initial Ratification of Tokenomics and DAO Governance Proposal for Unique Fans community.

Community ownership is ensured as the users of the platform are set to earn the majority of the tokens through key activities contributing to the growth of the platform over 5 years.

The DAO (Decentralised Autonomous Organisation) will be set up before year 2 and will be allocated 20% of the tokens over a period of 4 years until year 5.

Details of the proposal can be found here:
https://www.unique.one/blog/uniquefans-tokenomics-governance

$FANS holders can reject or approve this proposal.  We have decided to use the quadratic voting method to allow voters to express the degree of their preferences across multiple choices if they choose.  In case this proposal is rejected, the founding team will undertake further discussion with the Unique Fans community and come up with a new proposal.

Read more about Quadratic Voting here : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quadratic_voting#:~:text=Quadratic%20voting%20is%20a%20collective,voting%20paradox%20and%20majority%20rule.
which was proposed by Vitalik Buterin at one point as a solution to prevent whale manipulation.
author: 0xD4C4022B6de4f3aB995b57F2a9Ad0b1982642038
